title: U.S. Stock Futures Rise After Tech-Led Selloff
sub_head: Earnings are due after Wednesdayâ€™s close from Meta Platforms, Ford and Mattel
body:
U.S. stock futures rose, putting major indexes on track to recoup some of their losses Wednesday after selling off sharply in the previous session.
Futures for the S&P 500 added 1%, and those for the Dow Jones Industrial Average climbed 1.1%. Contracts for the technology-focused Nasdaq-100 gained 1%.
